name: aMarketForce
tag_list: prospect-database-development, customer-database-validation, lead-generation-services, contact-list-development, email-database-development, database-validation, list-scrubbing, b2b-lead-generation, lead-verification
overview:
aMarketForce provides sales, B2B marketing and customer support services to growth companies in Silicon Valley, with a focus on lead and demand generation. We support B2B lead generation by creating accurate, focused prospect lists for sales teams, and support demand generation by developing clear messaging and targeted communications to decision makers and influencers.

We focus on companies where sales teams do everything from prospecting to lead development, qualification and nurturing, plus managing the sales cycle. We offload non-core sales activities from your sales team so that they can focus on selling, while we provide the sales-support activities.

aMarketForce services run the gamut from prospect list development, lead generation, e-mail campaigns to customer and technical support, and technical writing and documentation.
